website_summaries.verdict: This video monitor allows you to both see and hear your baby when you're not in the same room.
pros: Stands out for the two-way communication mode that lets you speak to your child to soothe them or let them know you're on your way
Compatible with Google Assistant or Alexa for hands-free control
cons: Takes a little while to set up

customer_reviews.title: Some Minor Flaws
customer_reviews.text: First time purchasing a baby cam here. I’m leaning 3.5 stars. First the pro’s: - Very easy setup with the included screen. - Decent screen quality, Good, not amazing - Can capture a good sized area The Con’s; - The temperature monitor is garbage. Tonight the app on my phone said 71 f, the screen attachment said 75 f. Which is it? - The app is bloated with all the junk Motorola wants to sell you and requires a few steps to get to the camera. - The controls on the screen are clunky and not responsive all the time. - The intercom is painfully slow, making it nearly unusable in that respect. That’s where I’m at with the first
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Buy a different one!
customer_reviews.text: The price of this monitor does not equal the quality. Save your money. Overall the picture quality is terrible. The icons are super pixelated. Night vision is just ok. Also whenever the camera loses connection to the internet it beeps super loud. With no way of disabling it. While we liked that this had wifi capabilities we didn't always need it to be on wifi. Would prefer a camera with a local band to connect to (like normal baby monitors) and then use wifi with the Hubble app when needed. Overall it feels like a camera from 2004. Your money is better spent on another product. Returning ours after a week of frustrations.
customer_reviews.author: C. Bohn

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor but if you need to be able to talk to your kid, go with something else.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great monitor, the issue that I have is that the two way talking is terrible. When I try and talk to my daughter, she can’t hear it because the sound is so low. I’ve contacted support to see if there is a way to turn up the volume so she can hear me but they said that is not adjustable. So if you need to be able to talk to your kid through the monitor, I would say this one probably isn’t for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: best of the best
customer_reviews.text: This baby monitor has all the features we wanted,The main value in this monitor is sound and picture quality. It comes with an optical zoom camera which allows you to zoom in on your little one with crisp and refined clarity. The battery life is good for about 24 hours or so unplugged. That’s an extant I am sure there are tactics that others have found to increase that.So glad we made this purchase and it is one we highly highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: kiti

customer_reviews.title: great little camera
customer_reviews.text: We use this to monitor my family member. The image quality is great and the setup was simple. It has alot of great features, but we don't use them all. Love that I can monitor while away from home unlike a traditional monitor that you can only use while in the house. The only con I have found so far is that I cannot get the base station display as loud as I would like. I really wish it would go louder because when the TV is on or people are talking you can barely hear it
customer_reviews.author: Annee

customer_reviews.title: Great baby monitor! I love it
customer_reviews.text: I installed the baby monitor a couple days ago and I love it, the quality of the image display is great and the sound is pretty good too, I can see my kids very clear even with very little light, it’s super easy to set up, it comes with instructions and everything you need. This monitor has all the features I wanted and works great. I love the zoom lens which provides a much clearer picture than zoom features on other cameras. Would definitely recommend it to anyone who is looking for a versatile monitor at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Flashing Blue LED Lights!
customer_reviews.text: The flashing blue light is so bright and there is no way to turn it off. This is a terrible feature for a BABY ROOM, where my infant already struggles getting enough sleep. This coupled with the incredibly short battery life makes this monitor nearly unusable. The video and audio quality is also much lower than the cheaper unit we also have. The only reason to purchase this unit is because of the ability to use the monitor and the app to view the stream. I would highly recommend going with another product as this one is nearly unusable in a Baby Room. Purchase this monitor only if you enjoy flashing blue LED lights going all night long.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Hlavin

customer_reviews.title: SUPER ANNOYING FLASHING BLUE LIGHT
customer_reviews.text: Whoever designed this monitor is a moron. Whoever approved the design to be sent to market is a collosal moron. The monitor has a blinding pulsing blue light that can't be disabled. It's what every parent wants in their infant's bedroom right? A flipping bright beacon to beckon your baby all night long. DO NOT BUY THIS. I would skip all Motorola products if I were you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is horrible, there is a blinking bright light on the camera that is absolutely terrible, makes the entire room bright and my daughter could not sleep with that blinking light on her face. The app does not work well, the connection is always very poor. This baby monitor was by far the worst that I have ever tested, and I have tested many.
customer_reviews.author: Marrye Dresch

customer_reviews.title: Bad mobile streaming and bright light on camera
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this for the mobile streaming or as a baby monitor. The mobile streaming works for 3 months until the return period ends then magically stops staying connected if you don't pay to subscribe. Also, there is a bright blue light on the camera that will keep your baby awake at night. If you try to put tape on it, the whole case glows. It's a shame because it would be an excellent product if the streaming worked and there wasn't such a bright led on the camera. But, as it is, it's unusable.
customer_reviews.author: The Aceman

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this monitor 6 months ago and absolutely love it. We did a ton of research after our first monitor stopped working after only 4 months. This one was new but we took a gamble and I'm so glad we did. I love that there is both an actual monitor and you can use the app. We have a nanny who uses the monitor and I am still able to check in with the app. The picture quality is incredible even at night. We are able to use this monitor all day and it still has battery life. I would highly recommend this monitor
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Motorola says it all
customer_reviews.text: I put a lot of hope into the camera and it doesn’t fail me. Very good build quality. Single is very stable and I haven’t had any problem in a 4000sqft area. Battery life is pretty good, hold up two days but I usually charge every two days. Picture quality especially night vision is nice and clear. Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Fu Y.

customer_reviews.title: Sound too low
customer_reviews.text: I cant get the screen saver to stop. The sound is so low I cant hear anything even when the TV is on in the room. Dont buy this product. I am returning my second unit purchased thinking the 1st one was flawed
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Meral

customer_reviews.title: DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: We loved this monitor when we first got it.. less than 3 months later what a waste of money. After the first month it stopped connecting to the internet so I couldn’t watch it on my phone and now the night vision is out so when it’s dark the monitor is a black screen.. once it’s daylight you can see a very distorted picture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Low Quality, Failed in 3 months, Motorola and Amazon Would not Make Right
customer_reviews.text: The night vision failed within 3 months. I spent an hour online with motorola trouble shooting and nothing worked. I asked for a refund/replacement to no avail. Now the unit will not connect at all with the camera so not only is it useless at night, but it does not work during the day either. The app connecting to the camera was troublesome from the first and continually required re-pairing. Now it has failed altogether. This definitely has made me reconsider buying from Motorola in the future and I'm frustrated that Amazon does not have a return option through the Amazon website. Definitely undercuts both companies' credibility in my estimation.
customer_reviews.author: Reed

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: Good camera, when you can trust it. Consistently fails and disconnects throughout the night. The app is garbage, never stays "online" The actual monitor screen is fantastic but unfortunately you can not hear anything unless your child is literally screaming at the top of their lungs. For the price, I expected much more from this device. I only wanted 3 things: To see To hear To monitor while away None of which are consistently met. Definitely go with something more reliable.
customer_reviews.author: chelsea cook

customer_reviews.title: Distracting lights on camera
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice monitor overall. App is ok and picture quality is good. The only reason I don’t like it is because there are constantly lights on the camera that wake my daughter up. There is no option to turn them off so it doesn’t work well if your baby is light sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: Julie L Peck

customer_reviews.title: Great range!!
customer_reviews.text: Finally a monitor that has great range! I understand interference can reduce the range of your monitor. I've returned a few other monitors because the monitor would show out of range in our own backyard? Not only does it work in our back yard, it works in our neighbors! Battery is great & the app is a definite bonus!!
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a great baby monitor
customer_reviews.text: We always use other baby monitors. They will do it soon. We are always looking for alternatives. Until I saw this. I tried to try this baby monitor. So I think it’s worth trying with this sales value. Ok! He did not disappoint me. Has a very long battery life. Zero interference. The quality display is great. The sound is clear. I will recommend
customer_reviews.author: Patrick E. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is terrible - unusable
customer_reviews.text: sound quality is horrible. It's so low you can barely hear the baby crying if there's any background noise in the room where you're listening. Video quality on the mobile app is pretty decent but it doesn't make up for the sound flaw. Going back to the Philips Avent 630
customer_reviews.author: Laddoo

customer_reviews.title: Night vision and app don’t work
customer_reviews.text: This monitor has the features I wanted (monitor + app, night vision) but they don’t work as they should. The night vision doesn’t work - at night it’s just a black screen. When I contacted Motorola, they said this is a known issue and they are working on a firmware update. I don’t know how they can responsibly sell a monitor that has such a major issue. When I contacted Amazon, they said my order is no longer eligible for return. So I have a $200 monitor that only works during the daytime - frustrating. In addition, the app doesn’t pair to the camera. Also frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good baby monitor
customer_reviews.text: So far I do like this monitor. It was easy to pair and connect to my phone. I do wish it came with instructions saying what the menu options are and what they each do. I also am still trying to figure out how to get it to record motion, but over all it’s good for it’s price.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Doxey

customer_reviews.title: The best baby monitor
customer_reviews.text: The best baby monitor we’ve had , hands down! Picture quality is amazing, you can move the camera left, right, up, and down from the monitor so you can see the whole room. The sound is great. It plays white noise, can read books, can use your phone to watch the monitor as well.
customer_reviews.author: Madison Powers

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Camera Monitor!!
customer_reviews.text: The screen clarity is very satisfactory. The sound is great. I can see the whole crib. The zoom function is great. I like to move the camera to his room. The screen is bigger. The sound is better. The definition is clearer. They have very similar functions. But if you need other functions, I will choose it.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas S. Foss

customer_reviews.title: Excellent monitor
customer_reviews.text: I just started using this monitor and I am loving it! The picture is clear, I can turn on music in the babies room and even speak through the microphone! Monitor is large but not bulky and I love that you can stand it on attached pull out stand. I love being able to talk to him and calm him if he does wake up before going into his room and most times that's not even needed and he soothes just listening to my voice. This is an awesome monitor and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Ok i guess. But others out there with better value
customer_reviews.text: Found a better model at target with 2 cameras that are same brand. And it was less $ at target. Ended up returning this one. Annoyed that my wife and I have to share an account. The means the are phones both get notifications throughout the day even while I'm at work.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny C

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to receive this camera. Read the reviews and felt the good outweighed the bad. HOWEVER I was wrong. The unit I received was not very good. Video quality is ok but we can’t even hear our baby making noise from his crib. You literally have to have the monitor unit all the way up to your ear to hear anything. The connectivity over the WiFi makes it lag quite a bit. We also couldn’t access the lullaby or story options from the hand held unit. Nothing was working for us it’s definitely not work the money that is being spent to purchase this unit. BUYER WARNED
customer_reviews.author: Mike Meadows

customer_reviews.title: Customer support and night vision issues
customer_reviews.text: Night vision auto shift stopped working after 2 months of use. Super difficult to get support. Battery life and picture quality are just ok. Still waiting to hear back on my claim, I’ve submitted it twice now.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie_01

customer_reviews.title: Lots or features, great picture quality.
customer_reviews.text: This baby monitor has a beautiful large screen, and has many functions and setting adjustment functions. This is a game that changes the rules of the game. Can give you peace of mind. But you will be careful when you leave the child. It has high-quality real-time sound and image output. strong and sturdy. The sound quality is clear. I think it's worth every penny! So buy it! Overall, I am satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Todd Libman

customer_reviews.title: love this baby cam
customer_reviews.text: I just moved to a new house and am transitioning my 2-year-old into her own bedroom. This baby monitor has everything I need. It has great night vision for monitoring my little one under the covers or over it. I love that I can move the camera and zoom. I was previously playing music from an iPad at bedtime but this camera plays music so it works out perfectly. Overall, I am super satisfied with this product and would recommend highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Yu Haang Chan

customer_reviews.title: Very well made baby monitor!
customer_reviews.text: It has a nice appearance. And separate from mobile phones. A woman I followed suggested this. And I believe her opinion! I ordered it immediately. And arrived on the same day. I charged it and put it into use immediately. I like how big the screen is. How clear is the picture. I will definitely recommend this baby monitor!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah T. Dodge

customer_reviews.title: Returned - low quality. Overpriced. GARBAGE
customer_reviews.text: I'm SO surprised at the high number of positive 4+ star reviews. This monitor is GARBAGE for the price. Horrible picture quality, and average battery length. Also, the cord is pretty short. Overall, I hated it. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Thought it would be so amazing
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the only thing that was good about this was the battery life. The direction you can move the camera is very limited and i could only do it on my phone not on the device. the temp gauge was off by 80 and my twin baby girls were terrified of the way it looked and had a hsrd time sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Mom Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Selected this model of monitor for my 95 year old mother. I can keep an eye on her while I'm busy around the house. The quality of the monitor is excellent both during the day and the night time. I like the ability to rotate the camera while she moves around her room. I feel more at ease being able to see that she is alright at a glance.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Loecken

customer_reviews.title: Easy and fast installation
customer_reviews.text: My baby came home from the NICU with multiple problems so reading a heavy manual wasn’t what I was looking for. This monitor was sooo easy to install. It literally took 2 mins. I’m still trying figure out the app part of it so I view the monitor remotely, but the money was worth it regardless. Don’t go cheap, you’ll get cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Gustafson

customer_reviews.title: Impressive camera / monitor
customer_reviews.text: Love this monitor! I only spent a few hours. But I can say that this is a great display. I have been using baby optical equipment for 18 months. After finally getting tired of the picture quality. I bought this baby monitor. The image quality is 100 times better. Especially night vision. Glad I decided to buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Peter S. Troupe

customer_reviews.title: An excellent product
customer_reviews.text: The camera was easy to install, although an instruction manual would have helped. The picture quality is excellent and it performs very well as a monitor of an elderly person.
customer_reviews.author: Tomfred

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be louder
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a baby monitor and it does every thing I was expecting except I just wish it was a little bit louder. I can see my son breathe and that's honestly enough for me to be sold. He room shares with me so it's only used when I stay up after he goes to bed so it's not a huge deal for me, but I feel like it might not wake someone up who is sleep deprived (a parent) or a heavy sleeper in general.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Frequent connection issues
customer_reviews.text: Product works well when it works. Every once in a while, the handheld unit disconnects from the camera and is hell to reconnect. Mutiple power cycles, waiting, turning on and off, repairing - none of which worked. Sometimes it'll reconnect for a couple seconds and give hope, just to disconnect again and again. Signal strength is fine, and the next day in the same position it may work fine. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor battery life, great camera
customer_reviews.text: Camera works great in the nursery, and I love the ability to see the nursery through the app on my phone. Night mode is very clear, good picture. Only complaint is battery life of the actual monitor - which I’ve read other reviews stating the same thing. Ours only lasted 12 hours - fully charged and screen not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck!!
customer_reviews.text: After a horrible experience with an infant optics monitor this was a game changer!! Easy set up and ZERO interference with my WiFi router. Love how big and CLEAR the display is. Five stars!!!
customer_reviews.author: sarahF91

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great, necessary tool for keeping an eye on the kids. The mobile option didn’t work for us one time.. but other than that, it has been pretty reliable. The monitor is a good size and works great. Either way, it picks up sound very well. Being able to have 2-way talk and play lullabies is also an awesome plus!
customer_reviews.author: Jem

customer_reviews.title: Middle of the road baby monito
customer_reviews.text: We were really hoping for a sound activated screen, but you have to press a button every time you hear a noise and want to see what is happening. Over all not bad. Decent battery life. The other day the picture quality on the monitor got terrible. Wavy lines and distorted. Seemed to get better a few days later, but don't know what happened. I think there are better cheaper ones.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Pannell

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality product
customer_reviews.text: I have to reset the camera at least 3 times a day . Shows my baby on the crib even when she’s with me . I should hace done more research before buying this product
customer_reviews.author: cristina Ledesma

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use and install
customer_reviews.text: So far this camera is perfect. It was very easy to set up and after the first install it can be unplugged and moved and it will automatically reconnect the camera to the screen.
customer_reviews.author: 123gi

customer_reviews.title: Very useful product
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy to find it, my wife and I are very happy when using it, we can watch the sleeping baby when we are cooking in the kitchen. Give us more fun. Easy to set up and use. Motorola is a very good brand. I like this brand very much. I had a Motorola phones. When I saw the monitors of this brand, I was interested in it. The price is pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: THE WORST MONITOR POSSIBLE
customer_reviews.text: This is a waste of money. I have never written a review about any product on amazon. But this was just the worst camera. Constant glitches. App losses connection with the camera constantly. Connection gets lost with the monitor too. I leave the baby in the room and then have to go back to check on her since the camera won't connect with my phone or the monitor. I regret I got this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor
customer_reviews.text: The Motorola baby monitor has a great features as light, music and 10 baby stories. Great zoom cámara with rotation. Easy paired connection with your mobile, also, you can record from your mobile the video and the 2 way conversations. Cons.: The monitor would turn back on upon movements, but you can hear any sound and movement around, we have to click the “Ok” button in the monitor to see the activity
customer_reviews.author: Alberto R.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay connected to internet - handheld monitor must be near camera to work
customer_reviews.text: I am VERY disappointed in the lack of range/distance this camera has to offer - also its so frustrating that it never stays connected to the internet or linked to my phone. I can't begin to tell you how annoying the out of range beeping is as it's every 15 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Linze372121

customer_reviews.title: Eh. Maybe worth 75$
customer_reviews.text: Camera needs a wide angle. When using the pan option it turns the photo.. don’t expect to see much with this camera
customer_reviews.author: sayde carlsen

customer_reviews.title: Good camera
customer_reviews.text: Very easy set up. We use the monitor at home for our daughter. Clear picture. User friendly. It has a ton of features we don't need or use, but some might like: music, narrated stories, night lights in different colors. We use the app to check on our dogs while we're away from home. Again, easy to use. We love that we're able to use the camera for both purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little diffult to get certain things to work. Clarity is sometimes not the greatest. Connects to my phone good.
customer_reviews.author: M Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Loses connection easily and doesn’t work anymore
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this piece of crap. It loses signal so much that it will always be waking you up in the middle of the night, even if you are in the room over from it. After three months of having it, it has lost complete connection with the home monitor and will not connect to our phones anymore. So disappointed with how this has turned out because it’s a more expensive monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DOESNT WORK!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing doesn't even work!!! Doesn't connect!! It says it comes already paired and it's a lie I can't even connect it manually I've been trying to do it for an hour and a half!!!!! I want my money back because it's a total waste of money!!! You can see in the video how it doesn't even respond to what I press. Useless
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Obnoxious blinking blue light
customer_reviews.text: The blinking blue light is SO ANNOYING!!!! Tried taping it and still it is so ANNOYING! Hated it, returned!
customer_reviews.author: J&G

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera because it gives me the option to download the app on my phone and see Live when I'm away from home , and comes with a monitor when I'm home I can set it next to me . Even after my baby I can always use this camera to monitor my pets as well
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and away you go
customer_reviews.text: Only got today and wanted to set straight up! Absolutely love it! Easy to set up and easy to use. Perfect for both baby and my step daughter in their room. I have been looking for a video monitor for a while and for the price it's just what I wanted! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy chavez

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay connected to app. Temperature sensor does not work.
customer_reviews.text: I constantly have to reconnect the camera to the app. I have a Galaxy note 10 and it takes about 3 tries/ fails to get it to finally connect. Then I have to do it all over again in a few days. The temperature sensor does not work. Just keeps saying 32 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: william craig

customer_reviews.title: That my Dad is totally safe.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, it has a great picture. and timer alarm, I just can't say enough, this is the best money ever spent. The transaction was great and the shipping was very fast. Totally satisfied. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: MOTOROLA IS THE WORST BABY MONITOR
customer_reviews.text: my Monitor does not work at all. Camera is not pairing with the monitor and even with mobiles due to a software fault in the camera. I have contacted Motorola and they will replace the camera only and not the full set. Plus i need to pay again for shipping costs (returning the faulty one and delivering the new one). shame on you Motorola!!!!! unprofessional at all
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Mrad

customer_reviews.title: Very clean monitor
customer_reviews.text: Connection is very simple and quick,easy to setup,the monitor is very clean and nice to use,very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Fengjing Di

customer_reviews.title: Poor connection over time
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this monitor for 6 months and it all the sudden has stopped connecting to the parent unit intermittently. It works in our living room and if you try and move 10 feet to our bedroom it disconnects and beeps loudly over and over. It’s useless since I need to be able to have the monitor in our bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Metilda

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Really love this monitor. First week using and it and so far it’s been very easy to use. The app works great and the monitor picture is good quality. Would definitely recommend if you’re in the market for a baby monitor. The only downside is the price but it is well worth it for the piece of mind you get watching your baby from the other room.
customer_reviews.author: Barbra Smith

customer_reviews.title: You can buy a better one for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Only the view on the monitor works reasonably well. The preview in the application works very slowly, often loses connection, the voice is interrupted. Unfortunately, it is not possible to view the camera through the website - too big a challenge for Motorola. For ambitious, you can find instructions on how to "hack" the camera and share the view via www.
customer_reviews.author: Zbyszek

customer_reviews.title: Best of its kind on the market
customer_reviews.text: This is the third brand of baby monitor that we have tried that has a monitor and an app.. and it has by far proven to be the best. The app is so easy to use and the picture is very clear!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.text: So far everything has been great! The monitor is great. Easy to set up. App disconnects sometimes and it is very sensitive to noise and movement but you can adjust these settings in the app. Overall really great product and I love having a physical monitor and the option for an app.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Serven

customer_reviews.title: Volume too low
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed! Despite of this monitor being expensive I decided to buy it. But the volumen of it is too low, I can barely hear my baby and if I’m with family or friends just having a conversation I cannot hear anything. I have an older version of a motorola monitor and the volume of it is way better than the new version.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Horrible camera
customer_reviews.text: The camera rarely works ... the sound is horrible. I never know when our baby/toddler is awake or not , let alone our toddler who actually makes noise. The WiFi portion works 50/50. We’ve reconnected our $60 DBPOWER camera for our newborn because we can actually hear her on the camera and have no video issues.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t like it!
customer_reviews.text: Night vision is not good. The camera only turns so much which is not convenient if you want to view the entire room. Monitor kept shutting off. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Inna MK

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORKING FINE
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this monitor after a lot of research and it wasn't working properly when it arrived I was unable to use pair button on the camera there was no sound and no light blinking.I returned it and it's been 20days I haven't received my refund back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what anyone can complain about. Quality is amazing, and even better from the phone than the included monitor. I love that it comes with music, alerts, everything that you can need. And we have no issue with any little blue light.
customer_reviews.author: Noe Loarca

customer_reviews.title: Work Great!
customer_reviews.text: This camera worked great ! And the picture quality is good. Very simple to use, and the range is great. I Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amy C.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Very good camera with high definition, I use it in my living room so that I can always see what my cute dog is doing
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: SO Happy with the camera! I purchased two of these for my childrens rooms and they are wonderful would definitely recommend to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Aaliyah

customer_reviews.title: Battery sucks
customer_reviews.text: The battery life on the monitor is absolutely awful. Goes dead within a couple of hours from fully charged.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working ....
customer_reviews.text: Totally stopped working.... app glitches but now the actual screen that doesn’t need wifi crapped out. Just one day no visual ..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great budget WiFi monitor
customer_reviews.text: Got this monitor about a month ago and so far it’s been great. The photo and video quality is very good, no issues with set up, but the temperature is not at all accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie Krausz

customer_reviews.title: One month and it hardly works
customer_reviews.text: I've had this monitor for one month and already I can't see anything in the room when it's dark (i.e. the nigh vision is garbage). Even when the light is on in the room, the picture is very grainy and hard to see.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Hanrahan

customer_reviews.title: Good camera
customer_reviews.text: I really like this camera, but blinking blue light is awful!
customer_reviews.author: Sofia

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan.
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this moniter it starts lagging after a few months. My phone disconnected and will not connect again. It randomly will start beeping because somehow the montier disconnects from camera and wakes up my baby. Hate it. Would give zero stars.
customer_reviews.author: McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: What's up, Motorola??? Really...
customer_reviews.text: The volume is terrible, if that we're fixed would be worth the battery not lasting so long... fix it guys!!!
customer_reviews.author: Erma Macias

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. The picture is very clear. The microphone pics up every little sound. Charges fast and lasts! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Haris Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this monitor after purchasing two others and we love it. The range is great, sounds is great and picture is wonderful! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica D Tipton

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: very pleased with this purchase sometimes it losees connection with my phone so for that it will be more like a 4.5 star review. otherwise very good.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good so far
customer_reviews.text: It is a really friendly monitor, the size of the screen is excellent but the range is not so big, great night vision and great app service. Recommend it very much
customer_reviews.author: Roxana Noriega

customer_reviews.title: Poor sound
customer_reviews.text: I’m not satisfied with this product. I don’t know if it’s supposed to be like that but I can’t hear when my baby makes noises . I pair my iPhone thru app but it seems I need to pair it every time I want To use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: its okay
customer_reviews.text: the camera worked great for the first 2 months now the night vision will not work. tried getting through to motorola and haven’t been able to get through.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great camara
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can watch my baby from anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Katie G

customer_reviews.title: What's in the dark
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it. Father really likes motion picture capture. New parents dream.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible phone app.
customer_reviews.text: Phone app only works when it wants to. Returning for a refund and purchasing something better.
customer_reviews.author: Monty Mason

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, one major flaw
customer_reviews.text: Wish it didn’t have the blinking light, but overall satisfied with product
customer_reviews.author: corey

customer_reviews.title: Less worry while your baby sleeps
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely impressed with this baby camera and monitor. it works so well. When I'm in the kitchen cooking or cleaning I love that I can leave my kids in their room and still be able to see and hear everything. The screen goes dark when the sound in the room is pretty steady but then lights up if there's a sudden loud sound so you can see and make sure everything is good without having to touch anything. There's a talk back feature which I love because my kids like to hear me to make sure they're not alone.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Surveillance Camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this security camera because it’s wireless and can play soothing sounds if I want it to. It actually helps my baby stay relaxed surprisingly. I can also speak through it when I want to interact if I physically can’t. I can also record and save videos when she’s being cute(which is always) and silly. I love how I can control the camera a little bit if I wanted to as well. The camera gives an additional surveillance that my child needs.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Wifi compatible
customer_reviews.text: Few cameras have functionality to view from cell phone/laptop but this model does. There is some lag and interface is outdated. Easy install and great overall
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant product not just for babies
customer_reviews.text: Mother in law is so made up with this, it is making her life a little easier so she can keep a listen to her disabled daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Lenore Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: When I ordered this monitor it arrives the next day
customer_reviews.text: This package came in one day my mom has recently become sick and were able to watch her sleep and when she gets up so she’s safe I love it
customer_reviews.author: Candice Romeo

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I love it very much. My family loves it. It's very technological and affordable
customer_reviews.author: Aidan

product_meta.title: Motorola Connect40 Wireless Security Camera - Family Video Intercom Communication System - Infant, Elderly, Pet Monitor - App, WiFi, Voice Assistant-Enabled with Digital Pan, Zoom, Tilt, Night Vision
feature_bullets: ✅ VIEW ALL CORNERS OF THE ROOM - Get to know everything that's happening with no blind side. Our family camera monitor may be remotely panned left to right, tilted up and down, and zoomed in or out.

✅ VERSATILE USE - This versatile camera can be used to monitor other things than your baby. Use it for monitoring elderly loved ones at home, your pets or your personal belongings for added security while you’re away.

✅ 2-WAY AUDIO COMMUNICATION - Our intercom monitor is mounted with a speaker and a high-sensitivity mic, allowing you to communicate with your infant, family, or pets even while you are away from home.
✅ VOICE ASSISTANCE ENABLED - Control the camera without lifting a finger. Connect the device to Alexa or Google Assistant and easily access its features while you work, travel or do chores.

✅ IMPRESSIVE DISPLAY - Control the unit of this wireless video monitor on a 5" screen, or pair it to your compatible smart device. Play, record and share high quality content with your friends and family, day or night, with it’s built-in infrared night vision.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars370 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
